name: Slightly Stoopid
description: '''Slightly Stoopid''' is an American [[Rock music|rock]] band based in the [[Ocean Beach, San Diego|Ocean Beach]] neighborhood of [[San Diego|San Diego, California]], who describe their music as "a fusion of folk, rock, [[reggae]] and blues with hip-hop, funk, metal and punk." As a band, they have released 13 albums (four live). The band was originally signed by [[Bradley Nowell]] from the band [[Sublime (band)|Sublime]] to his label [[Skunk Records]] while still in high school.
